title: Lead Business Analyst
description:
BA

Experience- 10-12 years.

Job Description:-

Requirements, Planning and Management

Be self-sufficient in identifying and understanding business requirements/issues through engagement with key stakeholders.

Ensure that all stakeholders have a common understanding of what is being delivered and how it is aligned to the overall target operating model (TOM).

Identify & escalate as appropriate, issues & instances where any elements risking successful delivery are identified, assisting in the resolution of these issues.

Supporting the effective management of the necessary JIRA boards and backlogs with the necessary teams and stakeholders

Ownership of activities deliverables and outputs; Supporting PM on scope, timelines, plans, and RAID logs.

Process Analysis and Automation

Understand the application of practical and appropriate Generative AI with a mindset to automate and innovate.

Be able to apply effective analysis techniques to deliver the required outcomes that are fit for purpose.

Use your analytical skills to constructively challenge and achieve the right outcomes working collaboratively with the technical teams and wider stakeholders.

Experience in working in complex process, data, and tooling solutions.

Produce different forms of analysis output to an appropriate and agreed level of depth and audience.

Develop detailed target business processes that are aligned and support delivery of the TOM.

Facilitate workshop sessions on processes, data, and tooling requirements/solutions with working groups across the globe including taking a lead role in co-ordinating the successful delivery of any Proof of Concepts (POC)

Regularly review and edit requirements, specifications, business processes and recommendations relating to the proposed solution, to ensure they are up to date throughout the life cycle of the project.

Proficiency with Visio, JIRA and Microsoft Office tools.

Experience of working as a BA on projects that have a PPM focus using PPMs tools such as Clarity.

Embedding (e.g. Testing, Training, Support)

Build out test approaches, co-ordinate detailed documentation of test scenarios and manage end to end testing of the solution.

Work with the testers to define defects, acceptable tolerances within various types of testing.

Take ownership to ensure staff are provided with all training required including the creation of appropriate training materials.
